title: iBook G4 Batteries?
content:
Anyone know where to get these for less than apple charges? Google hasn’t given me anything reputable.

I want to replace my iBook G4 14 inch laptop’s battery.

 [‹ What's your ideal computer display setup?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118225506/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40745 "Go to previous forum topic") [premium looking typefaces ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118225506/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40810 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredcastle

comments.content:
I was about to buy one of these  
 [http://www.newertech.com/products/ibookg314\_batt.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118225506/http:/www.newertech.com/products/ibookg314_batt.php "http://www.newertech.com/products/ibookg314\_batt.php")

But my old battery was part of the big recall last year, so I got a new Apple one for free (despite the old one only lasting about ten minutes on full charge). Lucky me!

Oops, this is the link I meant to use:

[http://www.newertech.com/products/ibookg414\_batt.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118225506/http:/www.newertech.com/products/ibookg414_batt.php "http://www.newertech.com/products/ibookg414\_batt.php")

Sorry

Think I can find it for less than $100? Apple has it for $129.

...and this doesn’t seem legit or the right thing?

[http://cgi.ebay.com/New-Battery-for-Apple-G3-G4-14-iBook-A1080-A1062-M86...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118225506/http:/cgi.ebay.com/New-Battery-for-Apple-G3-G4-14-iBook-A1080-A1062-M8655_W0QQitemZ220190479001QQihZ012QQcategoryZ25437QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem "http://cgi.ebay.com/New-Battery-for-Apple-G3-G4-14-iBook-A1080-A1062-M8655\_W0QQitemZ220190479001QQihZ012QQcategoryZ25437QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem")
i’ve found eBay is the way to go for all things small, electronic, and slightly out of date.
